backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing access-controlled supporter request flow, supporter management, and user profile storage with mixins for authorization and blob storage.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old/new actor state types and a migration that adds an empty moderationQueue map to the stored state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping moderation-related features to their affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing the purpose of all frontend components, pages, hooks, and content modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes with shared global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, age gate, and global toaster for the React application.
frontend/src/components/AgeGate.tsx: Age verification component gating site access until the user confirms they are 18+.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Authentication UI with sign‑in, profile display, admin claim action, and sign‑out menu.
frontend/src/components/community/Linkif: Renders text with detected links and video embeds using tokenized parsing.
frontend/src/components/community/Modera: Displays and processes moderation queue items with approve/reject actions and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/community/PollCa: Shows a single poll with voting UI, results, supporter badge, and backend error handling.
frontend/src/components/community/PollsS: Lists polls and provides a poll creation form with authentication, supporter limits, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/community/PostAc: UI component providing edit and delete dialogs for posts, handling form state and calling callbacks for updates and deletion.
frontend/src/components/community/PostCo: Handles loading, displaying, and submitting comments for a post with backend error handling and authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/community/PostIm: Displays an attached image by converting byte data to a blob URL and cleaning it up on unmount.
frontend/src/components/community/PostLi: Renders a like button that toggles likes for a post with authentication and backend availability checks.
frontend/src/components/community/PostVi: Embeds a video attachment using a direct streaming URL and displays it in a video element.
frontend/src/components/community/VideoE: Renders a responsive iframe embed for approved video providers using a 16:9 container.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout with header, navigation, auth controls, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoadingState.tsx: Simple loading indicator with spinner and message.
frontend/src/components/Nav.tsx: Responsive navigation menu with desktop buttons and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/profiles/Profile: Displays a grid of profile images using direct URLs from ExternalBlob items.
Renders a list of user profile links, normalizing URLs and opening them in new tabs.
frontend/src/components/supporter/Suppor: Displays a decorative supporter badge with a heart icon.
frontend/src/content/articles.ts: Defines the Article interface and exports an array of static article metadata and content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, directory listings, and follow data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for posts, moderation actions, admin checks, and related mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaticAssetAvailab: Provides a query hook that checks whether a static asset URL is reachable with a HEAD/GET fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupporterQueries.t: Implements queries and mutations for supporter profiles, supporter requests, and admin approval flows.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining a light-themed color palette and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, wraps the app in React Query and Internet Identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission details, community values, offerings, and guidelines using card-based layout.
frontend/src/pages/AdultPacifierBrandsPa: Displays a grid of adult pacifier brands with descriptions and specialties, plus a section explaining the list.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Shows a full article based on URL slug with metadata, content rendering, and a back-to-articles link.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Lists all articles in a responsive card grid with category, read time, and links to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/ColoringPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityBoardPage.ts: Implements the community board with post listing, creation, editing, media uploads, moderation, and supporter features.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form and copy-to-clipboard email option for user inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Displays events, handles creation of new events, and manages backend-unavailable states with alerts.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a grid of preset plushie gallery images using cards with titles and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, calls to action, and a fallback image handler.
frontend/src/pages/PlushieBrandsPage.tsx: Shows a list of plushie brands in cards with names, descriptions, and specialty badges.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilesDirectoryPage: Shows a card indicating that the profiles directory is currently unavailable.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Implements supporter request submission, admin approval tools, and error handling with multiple hooks.
frontend/src/utils/actorError.ts: Normalizes various backend errors into readable messages and sanitizes internal error details.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachment.ts: Provides utilities for validating image files and converting them to typed byte data.
frontend/src/utils/linkifyText.ts: Parses text into tokens by detecting URLs, normalizing them, and identifying YouTube/Vimeo embeds.
frontend/src/utils/profileImages.ts: Converts File objects to bytes or ExternalBlob, and manages preview URLs for profile images.
frontend/src/utils/staticAssetCheck.ts: Checks reachability of static assets using HEAD with GET fallback and abort control.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Retrieves, stores, and clears URL or session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/videoAttachment.ts: Validates video files against type and size limits and formats file sizes.
frontend/src/utils/videoEmbeds.ts: Detects YouTube and Vimeo URLs and returns structured embed descriptors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, custom colors, typography, layout, and animation settings.
project_state.json: Defines project state, requirements, features, and pending moderation-related feature requests.
